nodes.text: Grand Army of the Republic broadcast
The Grand Army of the Republic broadcast was a HoloNet broadcast dedicated towards the servicemen of the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars.

The broadcast was transmitted across the galaxy, reaching Clone troopers and other members of the GAR in various locations, like Mimban and the Rishi moon. A Bettie-Bot worked as a VJ for a music show on the broadcasting system.
